public ref class Queryable abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组用于查询实现 的数据结构的 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）方法。

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying data structures that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在类中声明的方法集提供了标准查询运算符的实现, 用于查询实现的数据源。The set of methods declared in the class provides an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 标准查询运算符是遵循模式的常规用途方法, [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]使您能够对任何中的数据进行遍历、筛选和投影操作。基于网络的编程语言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 此类中的大多数方法被定义为扩展类型的扩展方法。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the type. 这意味着, 可以像调用实现的任何对象上的实例方法一样调用它们。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 这种扩展的方法不会直接执行任何查询。These methods that extend do not perform any querying directly. 它们的功能是生成一个对象, 该对象是表示累积查询的表达式树。Instead, their functionality is to build an object, which is an expression tree that represents the cumulative query. 然后, 方法将新的表达式树传递到输入的方法或方法。The methods then pass the new expression tree to either the method or the method of the input . 调用的方法取决于方法是否返回单一实例值 (在这种情况下 , 调用或具有可枚举的结果), 在这种情况下, 会调用。The method that is called depends on whether the method returns a singleton value, in which case is called, or has enumerable results, in which case is called. 目标数据的实际查询执行由实现的类执行。The actual query execution on the target data is performed by a class that implements . 任何实现的预期结果是 : 执行由标准查询运算符方法构造的表达式树的结果等效于调用中的相应方法的结果如果数据源为, 则为类。The expectation of any implementation is that the result of executing an expression tree that was constructed by a standard query operator method is equivalent to the result of calling the corresponding method in the class, if the data source were an . 除了对对象执行的标准查询运算符方法之外, 此类还包含一个方法, 该方法将对象类型为对象。In addition to the standard query operator methods that operate on objects, this class also contains a method, , which types objects as objects.

span.span: Language-Integrated Query (LINQ)
Standard Query Operators Overview
Expression Trees
LINQ to SQL

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法至少具有一个类型为的参数, 其类型参数为类型之一。 This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 对于这些参数, 可以传入 lambda 表达式, 并将其编译为。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法生成一个 , 它表示调用自身作为构造的泛型方法。 The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后, 它将传递给由 `source`参数的属性表示的的方法。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 由于执行表示调用的表达式树而发生的查询行为取决于`source`参数类型的实现。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 预期的行为是将指定函数`func`应用于源序列中的每个值, 并返回累计值。The expected behavior is that the specified function, `func`, is applied to each value in the source sequence and the accumulated value is returned. 中`source`的第一个值用作累积值的种子值, 该值对应于中`func`的第一个参数。The first value in `source` is used as the seed value for the accumulated value, which corresponds to the first parameter in `func`. 为了简化常见聚合运算, 标准查询运算符集还包括两个计数方法, 和四个数值聚合方法, 即、、和.To simplify common aggregation operations, the set of standard query operators also includes two counting methods, and , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用从字符串数组生成句子。The following code example demonstrates how to use to build a sentence from an array of strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法至少具有一个类型为的参数, 其类型参数为类型之一。 This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 对于这些参数, 可以传入 lambda 表达式, 并将其编译为。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法生成一个 , 它表示调用自身作为构造的泛型方法。 The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后, 它将传递给由 `outer`参数的属性表示的的方法。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `outer` parameter. 由于执行表示调用的表达式树而发生的查询行为取决于`outer`参数类型的实现。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `outer` parameter. 预期的行为是内部联接的行为。The expected behavior is that of an inner join. 和函数分别`outer`用于从和`inner`提取键。 `innerKeySelector` `outerKeySelector`The `outerKeySelector` and `innerKeySelector` functions are used to extract keys from `outer` and `inner`, respectively. 比较这些键是否相等以匹配每个序列中的元素。These keys are compared for equality to match elements from each sequence. 为中`inner`的每个元素存储的元素对与中`outer`的元素匹配。A pair of elements is stored for each element in `inner` that matches an element in `outer`. 然后调用`resultSelector`函数, 以便从每对匹配元素投影结果对象。Then the `resultSelector` function is invoked to project a result object from each pair of matching elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用基于公共键对两个序列执行内部联接。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform an inner join of two sequences based on a common key. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法至少具有一个类型为的参数, 其类型参数为类型之一。 This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 对于这些参数, 可以传入 lambda 表达式, 并将其编译为。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法生成一个 , 它表示调用自身作为构造的泛型方法。 The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后, 它将传递给由 `source`参数的属性表示的的方法。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 由于执行表示调用的表达式树而发生的查询行为取决于`source`参数类型的实现。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 预期的行为是对的`collectionSelector` `source`每个元素调用, 以将其投影到可枚举的形式。The expected behavior is that it invokes `collectionSelector` on each element of `source` to project it into an enumerable form. 然后`resultSelector` , 对每个中间序列中的每个元素调用所表示的函数。Then the function represented by `resultSelector` is invoked on each element in each intermediate sequence. 生成的值连接为一维序列。The resulting values are concatenated into a single, one-dimensional sequence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对数组执行一对多投影。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a one-to-many projection over an array. 此示例使用结果选择器函数来保持对的最后一个调用`Select`的范围内的每个中间序列对应的源元素。This example uses a result selector function to keep the source element that corresponds to each intermediate sequence in scope for the final call to `Select`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法生成一个 , 它表示调用自身作为构造的泛型方法。 The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后, 它将传递给由 `source1`参数的属性表示的的方法。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source1` parameter. 方法将第一个序列的每个元素与第二个序列中具有相同索引的元素合并在一起。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列不具有相同数量的元素, 则方法将合并序列, 直到它到达其中一个的结尾。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如, 如果一个序列包含三个元素, 而另一个序列具有四个元素, 则生成的序列将只有三个元素。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the resulting sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来合并两个序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences.
